summary.span: 命名空间是用于 Entity Framework 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序。

span.span: The namespace is the .NET Framework Data Provider for the Entity Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `EntityClient`提供程序使用特定于存储的[!INCLUDE[vstecado](~/includes/vstecado-md.md)]数据提供程序类和映射元数据与实体数据模型进行交互。The `EntityClient` provider uses storage-specific [!INCLUDE[vstecado](~/includes/vstecado-md.md)] Data Provider classes and mapping metadata for interacting with entity data models. `EntityClient` 将转换到的物理数据源执行的操作对概念性实体执行的操作。`EntityClient` translates operations performed on conceptual entities into operations performed on physical data sources. 然后再将物理数据源返回的结果集转换为概念性实体。It translates result sets returned from physical data sources into conceptual entities. > [!NOTE] > 有关如何使用此命名空间中的详细信息[!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)]应用程序，请参阅[ADO.NET 实体框架](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a437041f-6899-4ae7-96ce-aabf528d7205)。For more information about how to use this namespace in [!INCLUDE[adonet_ef](~/includes/adonet-ef-md.md)] applications, see [ADO.NET Entity Framework](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a437041f-6899-4ae7-96ce-aabf528d7205).
